effect.sun_moon: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.

short_effect.sun_moon: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
